backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing menu, transactions, gift cards, and custom credit card management with add/edit/remove operations and sorting utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrading old actor state by adding the customCreditCards map while preserving existing data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in the POS app UI and logic.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind styles defining the app’s color system, themes, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document setting up favicon, app title, and root mount point for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component controlling tab navigation and coordinating POS, menu, cards, gift cards, transactions, and receipt screens.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorStat: Reusable error display component with optional retry button and visual alert state.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout wrapper providing header, footer, and page scaffolding with branding and attribution.
frontend/src/features/checkout/CheckoutD: Implements the checkout dialog handling cash, gift card, and QR credit card payments, including validation and transaction completion. Manages form state, errors, and invokes mutations before triggering success callbacks.
frontend/src/features/checkout/QRCardPay: Provides a QR scanner and manual entry UI for submitting card tokens, handling scanning states, validation, and fallback modes. Calls onScanned when a token is captured or entered.
frontend/src/features/checkout/Simulated: Renders a simulated credit card entry form with formatting and validity checks, notifying the parent when the input becomes valid. No real payments are processed.
frontend/src/features/custom-cards/Custo: UI for creating and managing custom credit cards with unique QR payloads, including card generation, validation, error handling, and deletion. Stores cards locally and displays QR codes.
frontend/src/features/custom-cards/QRCod: Displays a QR code image generated via Google Charts along with its encoded value. Allows configurable size and optional value display.
frontend/src/features/giftcards/GiftCard: Provides interfaces to issue new gift cards and look up existing ones, supporting code generation, balance entry, querying, and error handling. Shows results or descriptive validation messages.
Dialog form for adding or editing menu items with validation for name, price, and optional category. Submits cleaned values to the parent via onSubmit.
frontend/src/features/menu/MenuManagemen: UI for listing, adding, editing, and deleting menu items using menu-related hooks and a form dialog.
frontend/src/features/pos/POSScreen.tsx: POS interface that loads menu items, manages a cart, and initiates checkout with a dialog.
frontend/src/features/receipts/ReceiptSc: Displays a completed transaction receipt with print support and navigation back to POS.
frontend/src/features/transactions/Trans: Shows a table of past transactions with summary details and links to view receipts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCompleteTransactio: Mutation hook that sends completed transactions to the backend and stores them locally with a generated receipt ID.
Provides mutations for adding and validating custom credit cards through the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useGiftCards.ts: Hooks for issuing, retrieving, and using gift cards via backend actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, logging in, clearing, and tracking login status. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes identity state through a custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useMenu.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch, add, edit, and remove menu items via the backend actor. Automatically invalidates the menu query after mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables, dark mode styles, utility classes, and print-specific rules. Establishes the UI theme for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Loads global styles and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/state/transactionsStore.ts: Zustand store persisting completed transactions, with actions to add new transactions and clear all data. Stores transaction details including items, totals, and timestamps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, fonts, container settings, and plugins. Extends the theme using design variables defined in CSS.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s state, including existing and pending feature requests for QR-based custom credit card payments. Defines requirements and metadata for ongoing development.
